newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 7.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- President Jacques Chirac to reaffirm in television broadcast later in November that he will proceed with policies aimed at cleaning up France's economy despite mounting criticism.
-- Aerospatiale plans to hire more workers and step up production to meet demand linked to a USAir firm order for 120 aircraft and options on a further 280 planes.
-- Daewoo chairman says he may establish his group's European headquarters in Paris as part of planned takeover of Thomson Multimedia.
